node

Class Node_ConfigClass

  • java.lang.Object
    • node.Node_ConfigClass

  • public class Node_ConfigClass
extends java.lang.Object
    Configuration class. Container class. All intervals are in seconds
    Author:
    Parisbre56

    • Field Detail

      • Id

        private java.lang.String Id
        The client's id. Note that the Id might change while connecting.

      • accumulatorAddress

        private java.net.InetAddress accumulatorAddress
        The server's address

      • accumulatorPort

        private int accumulatorPort
        The server's port. Must be greater than 0 and less than or equal to 65535

      • refreshRate

        private int refreshRate
        How often the client will communicate with the server. How long until the server declares that the client has timed out.

      • snaplen

        private int snaplen
        The number of bytes that will be captured. An integer greater than or equal to 65535 should be sufficient.

      • snapTimeout

        private int snapTimeout
        Timeout for packet retrieval. 0 means no timeout

      • packetBatchSize

        private int packetBatchSize
        Number of packets that will be processed in each loop before exit conditions are checked. -1 means loop until exit conditions are met.

      • reconnectAttempts

        private int reconnectAttempts
        How may reconnect attempts should be made before the client fails without chance of recovery.

                    throws NTMonConfigException

        Parameters:
        refreshRate1 - the refreshRate to set. Must be greater than 0
        Throws:

        Throws:
        NTMonConfigException - if snaplen is less than or equal to 0

      • setSnapTimeout

        public void setSnapTimeout(int snapTimeout1)
                    throws NTMonConfigException
        Timeout for packet retrieval. 0 means no timeout
        Parameters:
        snapTimeout1 - the snapTimeout to set. Must be greater than or equal to 0
        Throws:
        NTMonConfigException - If snapTimeout is less than 0

      • getPacketBatchSize

        public int getPacketBatchSize()
        Number of packets that will be processed in each loop before exit conditions are checked. -1 means loop until exit conditions are met.
        Returns:
        the packetBatchSize

      • setPacketBatchSize

        public void setPacketBatchSize(int packetBatchSize1)
                        throws NTMonConfigException
        Number of packets that will be processed in each loop before exit conditions are checked. This speeds up the processing of packets, since many packets are loaded to memory at once, instead of one at a time. Setting this to org.jnetpcap.Pcap.LOOP_INFINITE (-1) means loop until exit conditions are met.
        Parameters:
        packetBatchSize1 - the packetBatchSize to set. Must be greatar than 0 or equal to org.jnetpcap.Pcap.LOOP_INFINITE (-1)
        Throws:
        NTMonConfigException - If packetBatchSize is less than or equal to zero and not equal to org.jnetpcap.Pcap.LOOP_INFINITE (-1)

      • getReconnectAttempts

        public int getReconnectAttempts()
        Returns:
        the reconnectAttempts

      • setReconnectAttempts

        public void setReconnectAttempts(int reconnectAttempts1)
                          throws NTMonConfigException
        Parameters:
        reconnectAttempts1 - the reconnectAttempts to set
        Throws:
        NTMonConfigException - If the provided parameter was less than 0

      • createConfigFile

        public void createConfigFile(java.io.File configFile)
                      throws java.io.IOException
        Writes the configuration to the provided file
        Parameters:
        configFile - The file the configuration will be written in. It will be created if it does not exist.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If it was unable to write to file

      • loadConfigFile

        public void loadConfigFile(java.io.File configFile)
                    throws java.io.IOException
        Loads the configuration from the provided file
        Parameters:
        configFile - The file the configuration will be loaded from.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If there was a problem with reading the file
